To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private DoubleExponentialMovingAverage _dema;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_dema = DEMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_dema.IsReady)
{
    var current = _dema.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.dema = self.DEMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.dema.IsReady:
    current = self.dema.Current.Value
